      • createSectionFile

        public static void createSectionFile(java.lang.String partNo,
                     java.lang.String state)
        create section files for each of the part xml for this state Input Parameters: partNo - part number of the part-xml Input Parameters: state - name of the state in my states list

      • getSectionContent

        public static void getSectionContent(java.io.File partXmlFile,
                     java.lang.String stateString,
                     java.lang.String statePath)
        get the section content for this part-xml file containing the reference to the "state" for each "P" tag in the current section, create a new file in the "states" folder for this "state"
        Parameters:
        partXmlFile - the xml file to be parsed
        stateString - name of the state
        statePath - folder where the paragraphs would be stored

        method to remove special characters from the input string, remove numbers from the text of the section remove urls from the text of the section
        Parameters:
        builderString - text to be filtered
        Returns:
        StringBuilder return the filtered text
